result.execSummary:
The defendant Aaron O Wright Sr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid at a rate of $100.00 per month commencing 8/01/2015 with payment plan fee of $15.00. Alternate 11 days-consecutive.
With Huber, if Defendant has a job. Standard release conditions.

Defendant to have NO CONTACT with Vera or Catherine M.
Court orders defendant to follow all orders of Court's with competent jurisdiction.

To be determined. Hearing set for 7/27/2015 at 2PM.

AS OF 9/08/2015: Court sets restitution at ZERO.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant Aaron O Wright in court with attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang.  Mary C. Brejcha appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case called for restitution hearing. There has been no resolution. State's witness is not present at 3:23 p.m.. Court sets restitution at zero.
Restitution hearing on September 8, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Aaron O Wright in court.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant states he made an attempt to retain new counsel. Defendant now states he has Atty. Galang. Court will set this matter for another restitution hearing. There will be no adjournments on the next date. Defendant to be prepared to proceed. If Attorney Galang withdraws he will need to file a formal motion.  Restitution hearing scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
Restitution hearing on August 14, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Aaron O Wright in court with attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang.  Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case called for restitution hearing. State advises the Defendant stipulates to the bill of $399.24. There is another bill that the victim needs to obtain and State requests another date so the victim can obtain the records.  Defense counsel requests to withdraw as counsel. Court grants Attorney Galang to conditionally withdraw. Court will put this matter over for another restitution hearing.  Restitution hearing scheduled for August 14, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Restitution hearing on July 27, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
copy not located in paper file

Defendant Aaron O Wright in court with attorney Manuel Raymundo Galang.  Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties proceed to sentencing on Ct. 2.  Defense is requesting a separate restitution hearing. Court grants request. 


Court orders the following: 
Ct. 2:
- 15 days jail with huber (if defendant has a job) commencing 06/22/2015 at 6:00 p.m.. Huber with standard release conditions. 
- Fine totaling $542.00 (includes DVSurcharge) to be paid at a rate of $100.00 per month commencing 08/01/2015; alternate 11 days jail - consecutive 
- Restitution hearing to be set
- DNA Surcharge waived
- Defendant to have NO Contact with Vera or Catherine M..  Court orders defendant to follow all orders of Court's with competent jurisdiction.  Restitution hearing scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
Sentencing hearing on June 17, 2015 at 10:30 am.
